issue.title: [Python] Add simple examples to Array.cast docstring
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2700](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2700). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2129#issuecomment-396460198

The examples should include passing a DataType as a string alias, as well as creating a DataType instance like `timestamp('ms')`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2700?focusedCommentId=16560931) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2335
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2335>
